NavigatorPdfViewerEnabled.summary: The pdfViewerEnabled read-only property of the interface indicates whether the browser supports inline display of PDF files when navigating to them.

remarks.para: If inline viewing is not supported the PDF is downloaded and may then be handled by some external application.

blockquote.para: Note: This method replaces a number of legacy methods of inferring support for inline viewing of PDF files.

NavigatorPdfViewerEnabled.value: true if the browser can display PDF files inline when navigating to the file (using either an internal viewer or a PDF viewer extension); otherwise false.
